about_the_game:
Dive into the world of The Final Station with the immersive Original Soundtrack (OST) and Artbook. Featuring 10 tracks (with 1 bonus track that never made it into the game), this DLC is for fans who would like to support indie devs and appreciate the art of making indie games.

OST written by Geoff Hart-Jones.
The track-list is as follows:

  • 01. Porth Wen
  • 02. New Day
  • 03. Abandoned
  • 04. The arrival
  • 05. Live Station
  • 06. Nowhere
  • 07. Unknown Station
  • 08. Walls of Metropole
  • 09. End of the Road
  • 10. BONUS TRACK - Last Thoughts
